news.title: Trump's pharmaceutical tariff threat loses bite after Pfizer deal reassures drugmakers
news.summary: Pfizer's deal with Trump was a relief to the pharma industry. Drugmakers could strike similar deals that would make them immune to tariffs.

news.title: Private payrolls declined in September by 32,000 in key ADP report coming amid shutdown data blackout
news.summary: Private payrolls saw their biggest decline in 2½ years during September, ADP said. Private payrolls fell by the most in two½ years in September, according to ADP.

news.title: Trump's threats against late-night TV could spell more trouble for advertisers
news.summary: The recent upheaval in late-night programming has shown a spotlight on ratings and revenue. It has also spurred questions of political influence in the industry.

news.title: Meta greenlights Facebook, Instagram ads based on your AI chats
news.summary: Meta will show ads and other content to users based on their interactions with the Meta AI digital assistant and other generative artificial intelligence tools. Meta will also show ads based on the user's interaction with the digital assistant.

news.title: CNBC's Financial Advisor 100: Best financial advisors, top firms for 2025 ranked
news.summary: CNBC's Financial Advisor 100 ranks the best financial advisors and top firms for 2025. Here's how to pick the best planner for you and your family.

news.title: Qualcomm promises it can be an AI winner. What does it know that Nvidia and Intel don’t?
news.summary: Qualcomm shares may have more growth potential than the market is currently pricing in. But some big hurdles lie ahead for the chip maker. Qualcomm shares are down 2.7% this year.

news.title: Big investors are afraid of the stock market, and the S&P 500’s path to 7,000 just got easier.
news.summary: S&P 500 near fresh highs has caused skittish behavior by Wall Street’s smart money. That will help smooth a path to 7,000, says this trader.

news.title: Why Nvidia, Broadcom and other highflying stocks are especially risky now
news.summary: Momentum stocks in highflying sectors are vulnerable to a downturn. Even if the market doesn’t crash, momentum stocks are vulnerable.

news.title: ADP says businesses cut jobs for third time in four months as labor market takes turn for worse
news.summary: Privately run businesses eliminated jobs in September for the third time in four months, ADP says. Federal Reserve cut interest rates last month.

news.title: The vital signs for the U.S. jobs market were already flickering before the employment report was delayed. Just how bad is it?
news.summary: The critical U.S. jobs report on Friday, which is likely to be delayed by the government shutdown, probably wasn't going to reveal much good news. But it could have told investors if the labor market is getting worse.
